short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool to automate test cases running against web content deisplayed in the Chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension needs to be installed in order to create and replay automated test cases using the Jamo Automator tool.
